taxonomicnotes: Myers (1924) described Danio strigillifer from Upper Myanmar. Fang and Kullander (2009) treated it under the genus Devario.
rationale: More research needed to determine its current distribution, threats, and population structure of the poorly studied Devario strigillifer. Whether this species occurs in other areas of its range is unknown, but it appears in the aquarium trade. It is therefore listed as Data Deficient.
evaluator: Barbhuiya, A.H., Rema Devi, K.R., Dahanukar, N. & Chaudhry, S.
